attributes.additional_details:
London's air quality is amongst the most polluted in Europe.  We want strong Government action to ensure Londoners are protected from this public health threat.

Possible measure include banning the most polluting vehicles from the most polluted roads; a moratorium on airport expansion in the SE and a scrappage scheme for London taxis which will then be replaced by a green fleet.

Please sign the below and together we will put pressure on our leaders to let London breathe.
